item.description:
Yes, the Pajama Party is in a real train station! Wear your sweats, P.J.'s, robes, etc. Be creative with appropriate nighttime attire. 

There will be party games such as pictionary, marshmallow shoots,cotton ball contest and spoon races.  There may even be a few surprises.  It should be a lot of fun!

The cost is $30--IT INCLUDES PARTY FOODS AND MUNCHIES FROM WEGMANS GOURMET GROCERY STORE, WINE, BEER, COFFEE AND HOT CHOCOLATE, LIVE MUSIC AND A ROMANTIC POET--

Everyone can park very close to the station so you will not be embarrassed. YOU WILL HAVE YOUR COAT ON.

There is limited space with the kitchen and bathrooms 

The party is limited to 50 PEOPLE. ADVANCE RESERVATION IS A MUST. NO ONE CAN SIMPLY SHOW UP TO ATTEND. PLEASE, PLEASE JUST TELL US YOU ARE COMING.

 

 Send your check payable to Sitz to: Mike Baer, 3 Lakeview Gardens Natick, MA 01760.

 You can also register on the website. You can pay when you get there (NO PAY-PAL ALLOWED).

 Questions: call Mike at 508-561-4554. THERE WILL BE A SNOW PHONE. If the weather looks questionable on Feb 25, call 508-561-4554. The message will tell you if the party is ON or OFF. We have a snow date reserved.
item.name: Party in our Pajamas!
